sentences.en: Bel canto in pop singing - Is that innovation, or some useless gimmick?
sentences.cn: 美声唱流行 —— 勇于创新还是不伦不类?

sentences.en: Commit the crime at present gimmick is given priority to with virus of large - scale transmission computer.
sentences.cn: 目前的作案手法以大规模传播计算机病毒为主.

sentences.en: He dismissed the event as just a publicity gimmick.
sentences.cn: 他不理会这件事,只当它是一种宣传手法.

sentences.en: I hypothesized that all the things were his gimmick.
sentences.cn: 我猜测所有事情都是他的骗局.

sentences.en: It is just a public relations gimmick.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是一种公关伎俩。

sentences.en: Stella: So you think he had some gimmick?
sentences.cn: 史黛拉: 所以你认为他有什麽秘密装置?

sentences.en: The advertisement is just a gimmick to make consumers buy their products.
sentences.cn: 宣传只是一种使消费者买他们产品的花招.

sentences.en: The basic gimmick was the distinguishing of one bank from the others.
sentences.cn: 基本决窍是区分某一银行与其它银行的标志.

sentences.en: The ever - increasing proportion of savvy Internet users perceive the Flash intro as a dated gimmick.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的精明浏览者认为,Flash引导页已经过时了.

sentences.en: The pretty girl on the cover of the book is just a sales gimmick.
sentences.cn: 书封面上印上美女不过是吸引顾客的一种生意眼.

sentences.en: The pretty girl on the cover of the pictorial is just a sales gimmick.
sentences.cn: 画报的封面上印上美女不过是吸引顾客的一种生意眼.
他们也使用另外一种花招.

sentences.en: This is the flimsy gimmick of sale of very much time bar.
sentences.cn: 这是当时很多网吧营销的脆弱的手法.

sentences.en: Words of song is adopted much personification gimmick, messenger language are lively.
sentences.cn: 歌词多采用拟人手法, 使语言生动活泼.

trans.tran_cn: 花招，诡计，骗人的玩意，暗机关，<俚>产品广告噱头
trans.tran_en: a trick or something unusual that you do to make people notice someone or something – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 使暗机关；搞骗人的玩意
